Html:
Good Morning,

I need to use the Harvard Anglia citation style in MS-Word 2007, and wonder if this available download:

http://bibword.codeplex.com/releases/view/19783

 

is based on the latest edition?:

http://libweb.anglia.ac.uk/referencing/harvard.htm

 

Thank you.

ANMB

Probably not. It was up-to-date with Harvard Anglia when it was released but I would be really surprised if they haven't updated their style by now (bug fixing, new electronic standards, ...)

If you update the style you are more than welcome to provide me with a copy I can put here.
